title: Add functionality to snooze
body: when an alarm pops up an option to edit the reminder should be included instead of having to constantly hit snooze or exit the reminder and go into the object itself

comments.body:
Hello fellow Windows Platform Developers, please refer to this similar thread requesting for an improved Alarm/Reminder APIs:
http://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-dev-platform/suggestions/6281055-need-improved-alarm-reminder-apis-in-wp8-1-run

Much needed.
Also allow snooze till "next day" because annoys when at 9pm you get a reminder and want to snooze it till next day morning: you cannnot as there is only option for 4 and 24 hours, too few and too much.
